Text:
Thank you for all your work, year after year. Like many expats, I would not be able to follow the sport without your torrents.

Btw, the title of the entry is wrong. It should be "Moto 1". The video is fine.
You are welcome. Yes this is moto 1. Sorry for the mislabel.

Thanks slicknick.  I too must say that this has been a sweet way to watch the season.  I've really enjoyed the AMA this year as well as the GP series.  Thanks to you and to those like you, you've made it most enjoyable.  Thanks very much!
Thanks heaps for the uploads this year Slick! Awesome work!

Been downloading your torrents for many years now. Cant thank you enough.

You're the man.
Thanks for the season slick, love your work! bring on A1
